snippet: That Jaromir Jagr, who will turn 42 next month, is still considered one of his country’s top players headed to Sochi says a lot about the state of the game in his country.
lead_paragraph: That Jaromir Jagr, who will turn 42 next month, is still considered one of his country’s top players headed to Sochi says a lot about the state of the game in his country.

headline.main: Jaromir Jagr a Last Link to a Golden Generation of Czech Hockey
headline.print_headline: Jagr a Last Link to a Golden Generation of Czech Hockey
